idea:
Buywon is new age ecommerece platform with unique patented delivery system. We aim to be the largest ecommerce retail player in the Indian market. Buywon is a multi vendor ecommerce portal where sellers are able to showcase their products and Buywon Ventures Private Limited will invest the required marketing and business efforts such that packing, delivery and management of payment of the goods sold.

The sellers on our platform are free to focus on inventory and quality of goods other than offering a reasonable price to buyers.
name: BUYWON VENTURES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
VIZN, a new-age product masterfully incepted and designed by Klasy Innovations Pvt. Ltd., is India’s first AI/ML-enabled unified educational platform. This technological marvel makes every teacher, tutor and coaching institute’s job stress-free and trouble-free, and helps them improve the performance of every student effortlessly.

This artfully and thoughtfully prepared product aims to help coaching institutes deliver better learning outcomes with its highly-advanced feature offerings. Its unique features consist of monitoring performance and the academic graph of every student and teacher. VIZN is also the first-ever student-centric portal and app that meticulously observes the study &behavior pattern of students to make their ascent to the academic pinnacle smooth and easy. Besides this, VIZN is also capable of suggesting reference videos, generating MCQ Tests and practice papers, understanding the caliber of every child to ensure every child improves without much human intervention.

In order to give structure to this disorganized coaching class system, remove educational adulteration and provide quality education to the students, we are bringing a credible, unbiased and accurate rating-auditing accreditation system. This system will review the coaching institutes affiliated with VIZN, rate them on multiple important academic parameters and will give them recognition on the basis of numerous performance specifications. This system will help us monitor the performance of each and every coaching institute and assist us in delivering excellent learning outcomes.

We are equipped to take the coaching industry by storm and redefine the coaching class management system. Our product will generate employment opportunities for teachers, even for retired teachers by building a sustainable community filled with well-learned academic partners.

The idea behind building this futuristic product is to give an extraordinary AI foundation to coaching classes so that they can strengthen our tomorrow, India’s tomorrow that is attending classes in schools and colleges right now. VIZN will push tutors and coaching classes into the realm of futuristic learning.

The primary objectives of VIZN are

• To redefine the coaching classes market & simplify the process of learning

• To motivate, inspire & support teachers and students

• To reduce financial burden & save the time of coaching classes

• To evolve the market with future-ready AI-enabled solution

• To provide a better learning outcome

• To build a perfect accreditation policy
name: KLASY INNOVATIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
KD SURGIPACK LLP is formed and registered as a Limited Liability Partnership with the Registrar of Companies, Mumbai in the year 2021.


It is driven by the following dynamics as Designated Partner of the LLP:


a: Mr. Darshan Deepak Mehta

b. Mr. Dilip Panchal


The Designated Partners of the Company have spend decades in innovation and making Pharma Sector a better & innovative Industry.


We are designing and innovating the Autoclave Resistant Tape which is designed for use with high pressure steam autoclaves and dry heat sterilization. The Autoclave Resistant Tape is ideally suited for sterilizing surgical instruments and trays, containers, bags, double-blister packs, metal surfaces, plasticware and glassware. These items may be sterilized by steam autoclaves and dry heat ovens. The tape may be exposed to gamma irradiation or ethylene oxide gas sterilization


Our Aim is to develop and provide as many as possible solutions and consulting which can be used by Hospitals, Nursing homes and by complete pharmaceutical industry to increase productivity while lowering operational costs.


And to Uplift the Make In India initiative started by our beloved Prime Minister Shri. Narendra Modi, is also being achieved through our Start-up, we are making this Product in India.
name: K D SURGIPACK LLP

idea:
IndiAura is a product of eager young minds wanting to offer you nature’s Aura that our country has to offer. Hence, IndiAura. Born out of pure love, passion and zeal to make nature’s boon available at your doorstep for you to lead a healthy unadulterated life. We’ve gone across the length and breadth of our country to source the best ingredients that our pious earth has to offer. We believe in small batch, seasonal farm derived products that are good for you and your loved ones!


We are a young start up that believes in ethical business conduct, sustainable practises and conscious choices! IndiAura signifies our earnest approach to pure, high quality honest products
name: INDIAURA
